(OOC: Okay Yanshosh. See you sunday.)
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 06, 2000 12:14 PM
Subject: Gone for three days


I'll be out camping with family untill sunday, so I wouldn't be able to
post.

::Zardus/DevilDuer/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike::

Zardus flies through the forest, looking around. He frowns. Something was
wrong, he could feel it. He looks down at his hand, seeing that it was half
transparent. No! It was happening again.

"I'll be gone for a few days," he says over his comm-link to the Alliance,
"Nemesis is in charge untill I get back."

He turns to Nemesis. "Finish the meeting with Panzertron. Try to recruit
him."

With that, Zardus phases out, ready to phase back in in several days.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
In his quarters, DevilDuer turns around in his chair. He was not feeling
well. Stumbling across the room, he falls on his bed. With a flash,
DevilDuer
is gone (for a few days).
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Perndabot spins around, looking at the sky. He could swear something had
just
flown over him.

"Night vision," he tells his internal computer, his optics changing color.
He
looks around, seeing a bird. That was it. Perndabot lifts his gun, his
optics
widening when he looks at his arm, seeing through it. He growls. Not again!

"There is a Maximal at my coordinates," he says over his comm-link, the
device accidently transmitting that message over all frequences, then
sending
the coordinates.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Reptilica and Bloodystrike drop off the energon they had mined in the cargo
hold. Reptilica smiles. "That's 200k of energon."

Bloodystrike growls. "I hate mining."

With a flash, the two dissapear.
